description: This is a Dart source file for a Flutter app that manages a local SQLite database for Todo tasks. It employs a singleton pattern for database access, defines CRUD operations, and handles database schema creation and configuration.

classes.name: TodoDatabase
classes.description: Provides access to local SQLite storage for Todo entities, using singleton pattern.

methods.name: database
methods.description: Getter that returns the singleton database instance, initializing if necessary.

methods.name: _openDatabase
methods.description: Private method to configure and open the database, setting schema and behavior.

methods.name: _createTables
methods.description: Creates necessary tables in the database if they do not exist.

methods.name: insertTodo
methods.description: Inserts a Todo entity into the database and returns the generated id.

methods.name: updateTodo
methods.description: Updates an existing Todo entry by id. Returns number of affected rows.

methods.name: deleteTodo
methods.description: Deletes a Todo from the database by id.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a Todo and updates timestamp.

methods.name: getAllTodos
methods.description: Retrieves all Todo entries ordered by completion status and creation date.
